languages.text: When the wearer kills an enemy in a 1-cell radius with a shot, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Убивая противника в радиусе 1 клетки выстрелом, персонаж получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: When the wearer kills an enemy in a 1-cell radius with a shot, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.
When the wearer kills an enemy in a 1-cell radius with a shot, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Feind in einem 1-Zellen-Radius mit einem Schuss tötet, erhält er +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills an enemy in a 1-cell radius with a shot, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger einen Feind in einem 1-Zellen-Radius mit einem Schuss tötet, erhält er +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi dans un rayon de 1 case grâce à un tir, il bénéficie de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills an enemy in a 1-cell radius with a shot, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi dans un rayon de 1 case grâce à un tir, il bénéficie de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 当装备者通过射击杀死1格内的敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}会提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills an enemy in a 1-cell radius with a shot, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者通过射击杀死1格内的敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}会提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Si el portador elimina a un enemigo a 1 casilla de distancia con un disparo, obtiene +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} hasta el final del combate.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador elimina a un enemigo a 1 casilla de distancia con un disparo, obtiene +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 使用者が射撃により半径1セル以内の敵をキルすると、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を1獲得する。
